name: Mystery Cave
description:
Mystery Cave

A medieval farmer is trapped in a mysterious cave and he needs to get out! in order to do so he need to solve the cave's riddle, but this is not a normal cave, it is in a time loop, every certain period of time, time stops and the objects around him move to random positions and the riddle changes. 

Team

Laura mancilla - Technical artist

Daniel Torres - Game Developer

Andrés Lara - Game Developer
